title: Hyper X9
summary: The Hyper X9 is a tier 3 semi-automatic pistol that can be purchased from a weapons dealer vendor. It is the best pistol in the Hyper line.
full_text:
Hyper X9
The Hyper X9 is a tier 3 semi-automatic pistol that can be purchased from a weapons dealer vendor. It is the best pistol in the Hyper line.

Hyper X9
A rare improved variant of the Hyper series of laser pistols that is often the gun of choice for flashy crime bosses.
